tit.j: 大学コンソーシアム京都
tit.e: The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto
The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto
The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto

sen.j: 財団法人大学コンソーシアム京都（ざいだんほうじんだいがくこんそーしあむきょうと）とは、日本の京都府京都市周辺に所在する立命館大学、龍谷大学、同志社大学などを中心とした大学 によって構成された財団法人。
sen.e: The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto is a foundation consisting of universities in and around Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan, including Ritsumeikan University, Ryukoku University, and Doshisha University.

The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto is a foundation consisting of universities in and around Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan, including Ritsumeikan University, Ryukoku University, and Doshisha University.

The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto is a foundation consisting of universities in and around Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan, including Ritsumeikan University, Ryukoku University, and Doshisha University.

sen.j: 京都市内の私立大学間で単位互換制度を広く実施するため発足した「京都・大学センター」が母体となった。
sen.e: University Center Kyoto' established to widely perform the credit transfer system among private universities in Kyoto City was the parent organization, and Kyoto City government supported the establishment of the foundation.

The 'University Center Kyoto' was established in Kyoto City to realize a credit transfer system among private universities and was the parent organization. The Kyoto City government supported the establishment of the foundation.
The 'University Center Kyoto' was established in Kyoto City to realize a credit transfer system among private universities and was the parent organization.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外処理

sen.j: 設立にあたっては自治体の京都市がバックアップをおこなった。
sen.e: The Kyoto City government supported the establishment of the foundation.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外処理

sen.j: はやくから社会人のための単位取得プラン「京（みやこ）カレッジ（2006年度まではシティー・カレッジ）」や、産学連携事業もおこなっている。
sen.e: The foundation started 'Miyako College (City College until 2006),' a credit earning plan for working people, and a collaboration with industries and universities in the early stage.
The foundation started 'Miyako College (City College until 2006),' a credit earning plan for working people, and a collaboration with industries and universities in the early stage.
The foundation started 'Miyako College (City College until 2006),' a credit earning plan for working people, and a collaboration with industries and universities in the early stage.

sen.j: 2006年現在では国立大学法人や財界団体もふくめ、55団体が加盟する組織体となっている。
sen.e: As of 2006, 55 organizations including national university corporations and business associations are the members.
As of 2006, 55 organizations including national university corporations and business associations are members.
As of 2006, 55 organizations including national university corporations and business associations are members.

sen.j: 1993年 京都市が「大学のまち・京都21プラン」を策定する
sen.e: 1993 - Kyoto City Government formulated 'Daigaku-no-Machi Kyoto 21 Plan' ('The City of Universities, Kyoto 21 Plan').
1993 - Kyoto City Government formulated 'Daigaku-no-Machi Kyoto 21 Plan' ('The City of Universities, Kyoto 21 Plan').
1993: Kyoto City Government formulated 'Daigaku-no-Machi Kyoto 21 Plan' ('The City of Universities, Kyoto 21 Plan').

sen.j: 1994年 京都・大学センターが発足、単位互換を開始する
sen.e: 1994 - University Center Kyoto was established and started the credit transfer system.
1994 - University Center Kyoto was established and started the credit transfer system.
1994: University Center Kyoto was established and started the credit transfer system.

sen.j: 1998年 財団法人化、財団法人大学コンソーシアム京都へ改称する
sen.e: 1998 - University Center Kyoto turned into a foundation and changed the name to The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto.
1998 - University Center Kyoto turned into a foundation and changed the name to The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto.
1998: University Center Kyoto turned into a foundation and changed the name to The Consortium of Universities in Kyoto.

sen.j: 2000年 京都駅前に大学のまち交流センター（通称キャンパスプラザ京都）完成、財団事務局を移転する 京都学生映画祭、芸術系大学作品展を開始する
sen.e: 2000 - College-Town Exchange Center (Campus Plaza Kyoto) was built in front of Kyoto Station, and the head office of the foundation moved there.
2000 - College-Town Exchange Center (Campus Plaza Kyoto) was built in front of Kyoto Station, and the head office of the foundation was moved there.
2000: College-Town Exchange Center (Campus Plaza Kyoto) was built in front of Kyoto Station, and the head office of the foundation was moved there.
sen.cmt: 年号表記変更原文の後半部分が次のセルとだぶっています。

sen.j: 京都学生映画祭、芸術系大学作品展を開始する
sen.e: The Kyoto Student Festival and ART UNIV. started.
The Kyoto Student Festival and ART UNIV. started.
The Kyoto Student Festival and ART UNIV. started.

sen.j: 2003年 京都学生祭典を開始する
sen.e: 2003 - Kyoto Intercollegiate Festa started.
2003 - Kyoto Intercollegiate Festa started.
2003: Kyoto Intercollegiate Festa started.

sen.j: 2005年 京都学術研究機構設置
sen.e: 2005 - Kyoto Collaborative Research Institute (KCRI) was established.
2005 - Kyoto Collaborative Research Institute (KCRI) was established.
2005: Kyoto Collaborative Research Institute (KCRI) was established.
